job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: TITLE: Data Scientist/Machine Learning EngineerLOCATION: RemoteDuration: 8 months+ extensions                       ***********Must be eligible to work on W2**************** Ideal Qualifications:5+ Python software development for composition and modularity, debugging and following tracebacksStrong stats background and concepts including hypothesis testing, correlation, R squared, P-valueExperience with Pandas, NumPy, SciPy, PytorchTensorflow functional API, deep learningMathematics of machine learning- linear algebra, multivariable calculusSQL queryingHyperparameter optimization, regularizing regression modelsNice to HaveMasters HIGHLY preferred!!Ecommerce experienceResponsibilities include:Analyze large data sets by quantifying the data quality, identifying particular patterns, and visualizing resultsUnderstand business problems and identify the right data sets and ML/Statistical approach to produce the desired outcomesAdapt to account for changes and be able to propose alternative approachesIdeate and develop analytics and modeling solutions cross-functionally to build customized, long-term, and sustainable solutionsProvide critical thought leadership and enhance organizational capabilitiesOwn machine learning pipelines end-to-endWrite production-grade machine learning code using standard engineering practices and deploy models to productionImprove codebase and lead/participate in code reviews with Research Scientists and Data ScientistsHelp non-engineers develop their engineering skillsMentor junior team members and contribute to a culture where everyone is valued
